note: [ .She ; Her ( s ) . ] Multiethnic but acknowledging my fair skin privilege. Eclectic, Solitary, Christian, Afro-centric Witch. Vegetarian & Intersectional Feminist. Celibate (True Love Waits). Doll Collector ("Reborn Mom"). Baptized Lutheran Easter Sunday 2015. Volunteer experience in a variety of causes: food ministry, LGBT community center, marine mammal liberation rally(nonviolent), Black Lives Matter/Water is Life rally(nonviolent), donor to ELCA Malaria Campaign & Stand w Marianne 2020)
